comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Outstanding! I have seen a reproduction of this before in a book about Fuertes. (Louis Agassiz Fuertes, 1884-1927, American ornithological illustrator, see Wikipedia.) Oh yes, and Fuertes is the artist of his own bookplate--indicated by the initials "LAF" on it.
